title: Mads Pedersen Mixes SRAM XPLR 1×13 Setup with ‘Old-School’ 172.5mm Cranks at E3 Saxo Classic
content:
Lidl-Trek superstar zeroes in on breakout monument victory by embracing old and new: 'This is the perfect setup.'

Read the full article at Mads Pedersen Mixes SRAM XPLR 1×13 Setup with ‘Old-School’ 172.5mm Cranks at E3 Saxo Classic on Velo.
author: ahood
